resources.string: Everything is already up to date..

Didn't mean to pull you out from your app.

Squark is designed, coded and put together by a single person. Making every single rating a big boost for me.

The well-being of this currency converter rest entirely on your reviews. Have a great one mate!

Psst don't tell anyone 🤫 I'm using Squark and it's awesome 🔥!

It's a powerful app that lets you interactively convert your money and it's super fun and easy to swipe to get you where you wanted to be! More than just a boring currency converter, Squark comes with a gorgeous animation and over 170 different currencies around the world 🌍!

When you travel 🛫, you can easily swipe to convert 🚢 without ever using those keypads again🚀

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.delacrixmorgan.squark
Swap the base and quote currencies
